Comment: This response provides a comprehensive analysis of alternative translations and renderings of the biblical phrase "You must call his name" in a Christian context. The student effectively demonstrates an understanding of the nuances of biblical language and its impact on interpretation by exploring different ways the phrase can be translated to emphasize the act of assigning a name. The inclusion of various translations and explanations shows a depth of knowledge and critical thinking in approaching the biblical text. Great job!
